channel.title: Compile error

item.title: Compile error

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

it should be

sM("You pursuade Koz to sell you some itmes.");

You missed the

;
out

@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Hey, I put this code into client.java to say that you need 1000 tokkul to enter a certain shop. This is it:

} else if (NPCID == 2621) { PutNPCCoords = true; if (playerHasItem(6529, 1000)) { deleteItem(6529, 1000) { sM("You pursuade Koz to sell you some itmes."); } else { sM("You need 1000 tokkul to pursuade Koz."); WanneShop = 15;

I get 100 errors in my compiler, this is it:

client.java:13200: ';' expected sM("You pursuade Koz to sell you some itmes.") ^ client.java:13201: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:13202: ';' expected sM("You need 1000 tokkul to pursuade Koz.") ^ client.java:13205: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:13215: orphaned case case 21: ^ client.java:17028: illegal start of expression } public String passHash(String password) { ^
